member.name: M:RelayCalculator.Api.Controllers.CalculationController.GetBestRelayTeams(RelayCalculator.Api.Models.CalculationRequest)
member.summary: Calculates the fastest team of each gender group no age groups for the given swimmers and relay type.
member.returns: Returns a list of all best teams.

member.name: M:RelayCalculator.Api.Controllers.CalculationController.GetBestMastersRelayTeams(RelayCalculator.Api.Models.CalculationRequest)
member.summary: Calculates the fastest team of each possible age group and gender for the given swimmers and relay type.
member.returns: Returns a list of all best teams.

member.name: M:RelayCalculator.Api.Controllers.CalculationController.GetCalculationRequest
member.summary: Returns a sample calculationrequest for testing

member.name: M:RelayCalculator.Api.Controllers.SwimmerDataController.GetSwimmersByNames(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Search for swimmers by first and last name.
member.returns: Returns a list of swimmers that meet the search.

member.name: M:RelayCalculator.Api.Controllers.SwimmerDataController.GetTimesBySwimmerIdShortCourse(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Gets the fastest times on short course for the swimmer from a given year
member.returns: Returns times for all strokes in seconds.

member.name: M:RelayCalculator.Api.Controllers.SwimmerDataController.GetTimesBySwimmerIdLongCourse(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Gets the fastest times on long course for the swimmer from a given year
member.returns: Returns times for all strokes in seconds.
